QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Pediatric heart surgery - discharge
QAPair.Answer: Your child had surgery to repair a heart defect . If your child had open-heart surgery, a surgical cut was made through the breastbone or the side of the chest. The child also may have been put on a heart-lung bypass machine during surgery. After the surgery, your child was probably in the intensive care unit (ICU) and then in another part of the hospital.
